definition: a bursting of a container (such as a tire) by pressure of the contents on a weak spot
an uncontrolled eruption of an oil or gas well
a valley or depression created by the wind in areas of shifting sand or of light cultivated soil
a hair style in which the hair is blow-dried while being styled with a round brush
examples: As discovered by one Twitter user, however, [Meghan] Markle isn't just the queen of a beautiful blowout. She has rocked natural curls in the past, which has the internet praising "curls in the royal palace."
she blew out her knee in the race

definition: to become extinguished by a gust
